name: Neo-Shining-Eyes Heterochromatic Dragon
text: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand or Deck) by Tributing "Blue-Eyes Shining Dragon" along with "Blue-Eyes White Dragon". Gains 400 ATK for each Dragon monster in your GY. If this card is Special Summoned: You can negate the effects of all other monsters on the field, except Dragon monsters. You can only Special Summon 1 "Neo-Shining-Eyes Heterochromatic Dragon" once per duel.
